programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 Ep8
programme.desc: Wetlands - Wild Wild East’s wetland habitats are at risk. These marshes and bogs are the ancient home of the endangered Blanding’s Turtle. But each fall new turtles spring from the lake shores of Nova Scotia. If the vulnerable Blanding’s can make it through their first few years of life, they'll live for almost a century. But saving the turtle means protecting the wetlands, and all the other amphibians and reptiles that call the slow-moving waters home.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 Ep9
programme.desc: Crustaceans - The relationships between species like lobsters, scallops and crabs are numerous and complicated. Changing water temperature is bringing invasive species to the Wild Wild East, putting pressure on the species humans count on for important commercial harvests.

programme.title: Wild Tales from the Farm 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Hunkering Down - Winter is coming, and the animals take advantage of autumn’s final bounty before the cold, barren months ahead. Watch some creatures search for respite indoors, while others arrive from far northern climates to settle in the ploughed fields.

programme.title: Coastal Africa 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Sweeping Shores - The African intertidal zone is home to a unique universe of plants and creatures. Here, life has adapted to survive in a challenging marine environment - some species are able to live on exposed rocks, while others prefer the shelter of rock pools.

programme.title: The Living Beach 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Hawaii - Throughout the Hawaiian Islands, natural forces of creation and destruction can be observed in real-time as they work to shape the living beach. These beaches are forged inside active volcanoes: every bit of land exists here because of these red-hot furnaces.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Beast Buddies - Meet more Amazing Animal Friends, an animal shelter puppy that helps a captive cheetah cub get ready for the wild, and an injured monkey who wins over a pack of unfriendly dogs and a lonely mongoose that enjoys foraging with a flock of sheep.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 2 Ep1
programme.desc: How to Catch a Lizard - Tag along as Dr. Amanda rescues a blind pet baboon, and watch Dr. Charlotte’s tricky surgery on a pangolin whose leg must be amputated after a run-in with poachers. Later, chase a rhino, two young baboons gone AWOL, and a fiesty monitor lizard.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 Ep3
programme.desc: Dora the Baby Muriqui - Feel the enchantment of Brazil’s Atlantic Forest as southern muriqui Dora takes her first steps away from mum Mimi. Get lessons in spider monkey troop dynamics, bone up on tail-hanging technique, and see this baby find her place among her peers.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 Ep4
programme.desc: Thiago the Coati Kitten - Set a course for adventure with Thiago, a brave baby coati. Find out how this raccoon-like fellow sharpens his sniffing and foraging skills, crosses suburban roads near his lush Brazilian forest home, and avoids inanimate and four-legged dangers.

programme.title: Donal's Asian Baking Adventure S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Seoul - Donal visits the Yongsan Gu district in Seoul where he finds the Glamorous Penguin Café run by Sophia Yoo. She bakes European style cakes with a Korean twist, like her Mandarin Chiffon Cake.

programme.title: Grand Designs: House of the Year S7 Ep1
programme.desc: Hard-to-Build Houses - Kevin, Damion, Michelle and Natasha visit five hard-to-build houses, including a playful pink beach house, an extreme DIY eco-home, a redbrick reimagined and a London new-build.

programme.title: Jamie's Easy Meals for Every Day S1 Ep17
programme.desc: Today Jamie shows us his quick and easy recipes for a French-style roast chicken dinner, his various uses for leftover bread, and he makes a delicious prawn linguine.

programme.title: Jamie's Easy Meals for Every Day S1 Ep18
programme.desc: Today Jamie's quick and easy recipes include Margareta pizza meets roast chicken, and Prawn-toast toasties.

programme.title: World's Most Luxurious S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Cars - Join us as we take a look at a world of different luxuries each week. In this episode we get to peek inside the world's most luxurious cars.

programme.title: Rachel Khoo's Chocolat S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Something for Everyone - Rachel goes on a historical and spiritual journey to discover chocolate's universal appeal. Her enticing recipes include chewy, crunchy chocolate cookies.

programme.title: Gordon Ramsay's Future Food Stars S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay pushes his contenders to the limits. Who will keep a cool head as they face their fears 1,000 feet in the air?

programme.desc: Jamie's been experimenting with new recipes, and this week he's onto a winner with his Spiced cauliflower rice pie - a vegetable curry with a show-stopping difference: just before serving, Jamie flips it out like a beautiful rice cake.

programme.desc: Jamie shows us his deliciously different stuffed peppers, which are nestled in a flavour-packed smoky bean stew and finished with zingy avocado.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep44
programme.desc: The Undeliverables / Johnny Hawkstorm: Two Birds, One Stone - When his special package is deemed undeliverable, Archibald teams up with Mikilos and joins an elite postal unit to get the job done. / When the main attraction at a beloved amusement park goes haywire, Johnny Hawkstorm is brought in to investigate. But Johnny is slowed down when he’s assigned a rookie partner… Archibald.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep13
programme.desc: Unsolved Mystereep - When Gran's cane and Sandy's bear go missing in the middle of the night, Eep chases down every clue to the first-ever mystery to find the thief.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep11
programme.desc: Lucky And The Christmas Spirit - When Miradero's Christmas presents are delayed and snow isn't falling, Lucky and her friends decide it's up to them to bring the Christmas spirit to Miradero.

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever! Ep11
programme.desc: Elder Skelter / A More Perfect Reunion - Audrey is in for more than she expected after taking over the Elder position. Dot’s preschool reunion, pushes her to look more accomplished than her old rival.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep11
programme.desc: Cruise Control / R/C Turbo - The snails are invited to perform on a cruise ship and while onboard Turbo encounters a group of rodent pirates who challenge him to a race—loser has to walk the plank/When Turbo is knocked out before a big charity race, Skidmark creates a shell that allows the crew to race the unconscious Turbo with a remote control.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep7
programme.desc: Pet Project / Mission Improbable - When Mr. Tanaka adopts an unruly dog at Sam’s behest, the Zenkos have the job of training the mischievous mutt and turning him into man’s best friend material. / When Ellie's friend Maria is late submitting her painting to the art show, it’s up to the Zenkos to get inside the community center after hours, avoiding overzealous junior security Rodney, and get Maria’s painting on display before the show starts.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep44
programme.desc: The Undeliverables / Johnny Hawkstorm: Two Birds, One Stone - When his special package is deemed undeliverable, Archibald teams up with Mikilos and joins an elite postal unit to get the job done. / When the main attraction at a beloved amusement park goes haywire, Johnny Hawkstorm is brought in to investigate. But Johnny is slowed down when he’s assigned a rookie partner… Archibald.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep35
programme.desc: Hitting The Sky Note / Hug Fest - When Poppy discovers that Sky Toronto doesn’t sing, she sets out to convince him that singing is the greatest joy in the world./Poppy shows Branch around his first Hug Fest, a Troll festival to celebrate hugs.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep18
programme.desc: Verry Berry Gets It Together/Fur Mountain - When Verry Berry's adventurous spirit gets her in trouble, she joins up with a colony of army ants to learn discipline. / When Twig disappears into the coat of a dog and cohabitates with a bunch of fleas, the Mighty Ones must convince him that fleas are not his friends.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep9
programme.desc: Boots - Jack Sprat steals enchanted boots from the Treasure House and triggers a dangerous Devil Wind that threatens to consume San Lorenzo's treasure.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep38
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Shocking Showdown Of The Staggering Sugamechangere - It's parents' weekend at Lake Summer Camp, and Krupp's eager to make amends with Harold and George ... or so he says.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep39
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Polarizing Plight Of The Pitiless Poopetrators - George and Harold want Cash Networth to buy the camp and fire Krupp. But before he'll agree to pony up the dough, Cash has a small request of his own.

programme.title: Dragons: Race To The Edge Ep17
programme.desc: Bad Moon Rising - After a strange creature bites Tuffnut, he believes he'll turn into a legendary Lycanwing dragon when the moon is full unless his friends can save him

programme.title: Dragons: Race To The Edge Ep18
programme.desc: Snoutlout Gets The Axe - When Snotlout and Astrid must fly a ceremonial battle axe to a family wedding, they must work together when an Armorwing dragon derails their plan

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep24
programme.desc: Play It Again, Tim - When Tim is forced to take piano lessons, he actually enjoys them and Boss Baby realizes that Tim is being brainwashed by his piano teacher, slowly turning Tim into an old man

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep25
programme.desc: Research & Developments - Turtleneck wants to crack the Stinkless Serum formula and makes it a competition, pitting worker babies against worker babies, stating that the first one to the Serum will be the new CEO!

programme.desc: The Beast Of The Wasteland - Po and the Kids are once more waylaid, this time by Mole Rats who have deemed Bao their god. But when Bao isn't able to defeat the mythical creature plaguing the Wasteland, Fan Tong steps up to save the day.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep18
programme.desc: Danger In The Forbidden City - Po and the Kids finally arrive in the Forbidden City. After an assassination scare, Xiao enlists Po and the 4Cs for help protecting her during her father's funeral.

programme.desc: The Voltron Show! - With the Galra empire in upheaval Team Voltron realizes that now is the time to unite the galaxy and bring the fight to Zarkon

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep37
programme.desc: Bait With Destiny / Sappy Together - Eep gets jealous when Thunk is invited to join the hunters/Grug and Gran must work together after getting stuck to each other with sticky tree sap

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep37
programme.desc: The Great Chicago Hot Dog Crisis/ Wrinkly Humans Kids - Tip and Oh reveal how they invented sock dawgs to avoid war between humans and Boov; When Bobe and Guppa come to babysit, Tip and Oh have a crazy fun time with them, until Tip has to be the adult

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep37
programme.desc: Telethon / Enrico Caruso - When Sherman makes a million-dollar pledge to his school's charity to win an awesome video game, he didn't realize they actually expect him to pay

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep37
programme.desc: Lucky And The Resolutionary Fever - Lucky rushes to complete all of last year’s resolutions before the clock strikes midnight on New Year’s Eve

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep24
programme.desc: Dome Sweet Dome / My Pet Clamsquatch - Chet accidentally trades all of the town's tomatoes to the devious Ace Gecko and the FAST crew has to outsmart the lizard in order to get them back. // Skidmark has been secretly keeping a clamsquatch as a pet and it's up to the crew to protect the creature from a nefarious secret organization.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep21
programme.desc: Why Rhino Charges - You see there was a time when Rhino didn't charge and he couldn't see very well at all. Poor old Rhino really wanted to be invited to the Dance of the Horns up on the plains with Buffalo and all the other horned animals. But Rhino didn't have a horn, so he wasn't allowed. The Monkeys decide to help Rhino and make him a horn from a piece of old wood. But when Rhino wakes up he doesn't know what it is. ‘Aargh! Thing on the end of my nose! CHAAaarge!' And that's Why Rhino Charges. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep22
programme.desc: Why Caterpillar Is Never In A Hurry - You see Caterpillar was never in a hurry. When all the animals were racing around Tinga Tinga getting ready for the Best-dressed parade, Caterpillar was happy to sit in a tree and munch on leaves saying ‘Po-le, po-le, slowly, slowly, good things come to those who wait'. Then one day the rains come and Caterpillar disappears into a cocoon. ‘What's happening?' questions Elephant. ‘Wait and see' says Tortoise wisely ‘Wait and See'. Then Caterpillar transforms into the most beautiful butterfly ever!... But who wins the Best-dressed parade? Tales from Africa

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep73
programme.desc: Violet'S Flower Festival - Violet is organising a flower festival. She is so busy helping the other tots with their blooms she has neglected hers. Will her flower open in time for the big day?

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep74
programme.desc: Pumpkin Pie For Diggly - Diggly is bored of the same old scraps every day. Fifi and Bumble decide to make him a pumpkin pie as a surprise. But there's no flour left to make the pastry, what will they use instead?

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep21
programme.desc: How Can We Make Music For Mimi? - Mimi has lost the handle to her music box and can't hear her music. Jess works out how to make instruments and get all the friends involved in making a little orchestra and performing a fantastic song to cheer mimi up.

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep22
programme.desc: How Can We Find Sammy Snail? - Jess helps Mimi to find her little frend Sammy Snail who's gone missing. They check all the places she's seen him before and work out that if they follow the silvery train it leads right to him.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep50
programme.desc: Cj Wooferbug/What Did I Miss - DJ is excited to give her niece CJ her own wooferbug for her birthday. But the wooferbug proves difficult to transport across Trolls Village. Will DJ be able to get it to CJ before CJ’s birthday party ends?/When Peppy takes an entire day to get a new haircut, he asks Poppy to fill him in on what he missed. What follows is a series of short sketches, as we explore an average day in Troll Village.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep37
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Ludicrous Lunacy Of The Loopy Laserlightmare - Despite being terrible at the job, Krupp wants to be the camp director again next summer. That's something Harold and George simply cannot abide.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep38
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Shocking Showdown Of The Staggering Sugamechangere - It's parents' weekend at Lake Summer Camp, and Krupp's eager to make amends with Harold and George ... or so he says.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep32
programme.desc: The Big Break - Boss thought that breaking his arm was painful;but the true pain starts at pediatrician Dr. Kevin’s “jokes.” Boss enlists the playgroup babies to defang the doctor of his “comedian’s disease.” Tim obsesses about keeping his little brother safe.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep33
programme.desc: Escape From Krinkle'S - Boss has an opportunity to get his old job back at Baby Corp;but to get the interview;he’ll need the playgroup babies to help him escape Marsha Krinkle’s super-safe Bubbeezee playroom. Tim nearly misses Kabob Day at school.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep64
programme.desc: Through Caverns Measureless - When the gang chases Li'l Pequena into the portal, everyone but Puss gets super-powers and must join forces with a sorceress to overthrow the Blind King

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep12
programme.desc: The Party Games / Trolly Tales - Everyone gets excited because its time for the Trolls Annual funbased Party GamesPoppy and Branch try to convince the Troll kids that the library is fun.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep38
programme.desc: Eye Of The Clover - Clover wants to follow in her Grandma Rose's footsteps and compete at the dangerous Tournament of Doom, but King Julien forbids her to attend.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep12
programme.desc: Lucky And The Deadly Blizzard - When a sudden blizzard hits Miradero, Lucky and Maricela must work together to save the town.

programme.title: Where'S Wally? Ep24
programme.desc: Mad About Madagascar - The Wanderers travel to Madagascar to get fresh vanilla for Wizard Flambė. Odlulu is already there; using the Bouncy-Bounce Key to build an ice cream parlor up in a Baobab tree! Before Odlulu gives up the key, Woof playfully takes it and starts a game of game of catch-me-if-you-can. They must catch Woof before the entire island of Madagascar is turned into a bouncy house.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep5
programme.desc: Pupcakes \ Stink Or Swim - When Tag discovers that Scooch is a great baker, she encourages him to start a pupcake stand. But when Tag rounds up more customers than Scooch is prepared to handle, Scooch can’t keep up with the demand. \ Tag and Scooch’s race to pick up the most trash on Pawston Beach is thwarted by Frank and Beans, who just want to make more of a mess.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep8
programme.desc: An Inconvenient Tooth / Up, Up And Away - After Lula loses her loose tooth in the park, Team Zenko must find the missing molar and get it under Lula’s pillow in time for the Tooth Fairy’s visit. / Gabriel and Luis show off their new drone but it crash lands on the roof top. Team Zenko's mission is to try and get it back, but Yolanda won't give up her new hi-tech friend that easily.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep18
programme.desc: Summer Holiday - In need of some rest and relaxation, the Riders head out on vacation. But their supposedly perfect island getaway isn't quite what they hoped for.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep11
programme.desc: The Case Of The Fallen Star - When the brightest star in the sky falls, Noddy has to find it and work out how to get it back into its place in the sky before its light goes out forever. Will he manage in time for the fairies Sparkle party ?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep12
programme.desc: The Case Of The Annoying Butterflies - A strange new kind of butterfly is pestering the toys in Toyland – just when the Queen organises a butterfly ball. Noddy has to find out what's going on fast !

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep45
programme.desc: See You Next Pluesday / The Doppelganger - After learning Murph is moving away, Archibald wishes for one last day to spend with her. But when the wish magically comes true, Archibald is forced to relive the same day over and over again. / Archibald meets his doppelganger and enjoys all the fun that comes with having a twin. But when the doppelganger threatens to become a permanent fixture in the Strutter house, Archibald must prove he is the real deal.

programme.desc: Curse Of The Cicadas / Beat A Fajita - The snails accidentally wake a group of cicadas from their hibernation and after the bugs begin eating the town's food supply the snails go to extreme measures to rid the city of the /A celebrity chef steals Tito's taco recipe and challenges the FAST crew to a relay race against his own group of copycat racing snails.

Team Zenko's mission is to try and get it back, but Yolanda won't give up her new hi-tech friend that easily.

programme.desc: Lucky And The Cousin Caper - Lucky and the PALs must rescue Julian after he gets in too deep while pledging a secret society at his school

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep25
programme.desc: Hard Luck Hardcase / Bee Story - Hardcase follows the crew to the desert and goes to extreme lengths attempting to finally get his revenge on Turbo. // White Shadow loses his good-luck charm and spirals into a streak of terrible luck and the crew must help him find it before things get any worse.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep23
programme.desc: Why Lion Roars - You see there was a time when Lion had lost his roar. Crocodile was snapping at all the animals in the Waterhole and Lion opened his big mouth but nothing came out! Tiny Flea tells Lion that if he dares to enter the Great Cave of Tinga Tinga then maybe he will find his roar. Lion plucks up courage and goes into the Great Cave. He roars with all his might, but a bigger roar comes back! Lion stands strong. He roars again and an even bigger roar comes back. Lion's very own Echo! He has found his roar! From that day on Lion always roars with pride, showing any beast who's the real King of Tinga Tinga. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep24
programme.desc: Why Zebra Has Stripes - Zebra was once very easy to spot in Tinga Tinga as he was bright white all over. This very annoying as all he wanted was to be left alone to munch on yummy grass and get fat. One day, Eagle arrives at the Watering Hole with a new pair of sharp talons saying that she found them in the Great Cave. The animals excitedly rush to find something for themselves. Zebra accompanies Tortoise and the Monkeys into the Cave where they discover the last remaining item; a plain black coat. The Monkeys persuade Zebra to try it on. By holding in his stomach, Zebra manages to get the coat on but it is extremely tight and the black coat starts to rip. In fact, the more Zebra eats the more the coat rips until Zebra has a stripy black and white coat which he is extremely proud of. Not only that, his new stripes make him very difficult to spot amongst the tall grasses of the plains. Finally, Zebra can eat as much grass as he likes and not be spotted by the other animals!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep75
programme.desc: Rockabye Stingo - Fifi has lost Cottonsocks, her beloved toy rabbit. She searches the garden for it to no avail. But that couldn't be Stingo cuddling it could it?

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep76
programme.desc: Inspector Stingo - Fifi's trowel has gone missing. Stingo decides to take the matter in hand and launch an investigation to find the culprit.

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep23
programme.desc: Why Won'T My Kite Fly? - Jess is given his very first kite by Mimi. It's very special indeed. He can't wait to fly it! But first he has to work out HOW!

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep24
programme.desc: How Did A Dandelion Seed Get Into Mimi'S Garden? - Mimi is shocked to find a dandelion plant in her lovely pink and purple garden. She didn't plant it there herself, so how on earth did the dandelion get there? Jess is determined to find out and in the process they work out how some seeds are transported by birds, some in the coats of animals and some in the wind. Jess says goodbye and asks the children to see how many different types of seeds and flowers they can spot.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep51
programme.desc: Tall Tail/Bfff - Creek arrives at a Trolls potluck empty-handed, explaining that a strange creature ate the fondue he meant to bring. The Trolls nod sympathetically, but Branch alone doesn’t believe this clearly made-up story. He sets out to prove Creek is a liar./ Branch presents Trolls Village with a time capsule which will survive the ages. The Trolls are excited by the prospect of making friends with future Trolls. Now if only they could agree what should actually go in the time capsule.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep217

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep216
programme.desc: It's YOUR Birthday - It's YOUR birthday! DJ Slip has the music, Mr. Salt and Mrs. Pepper are making a very special birthday cake, and we play Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to play at your party! As we celebrate, we play games and gather prizes for a pinata!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep204
programme.desc: The Trials of the Pirate Protector - On the first anniversary of becoming Pirate Protector, Santiago must complete a series of challenges meant to test his abilities and prove he's worthy all without the help of his tools or best mateys.

programme.desc: No Bones About It / Childish Antics - The mount has become a construction zone! Sammy and Raj need to find a way to fix this... // Sammy has his sights set on an Action Figure but it's 100 bucks! Luckily Malini has just the job for them...

programme.desc: Summer School - To keep a planned vacation, the boys do all they can to stop Dave from learning that Alvin has summer school.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep516
programme.desc: Puzzled - When Theodore drops a puzzle piece down a floor vent, he gets trapped inside while trying to fish it out.

programme.desc: Patnocchio / ChefBob - Plankton tells Patrick he's his conscience so he can convince the wooden-headed star to steal him a Krabby Patty. // When Mr. Krabs puts in an open kitchen, SpongeBob gets stage fright and has to invent a new persona.

programme.desc: The Magic Pumpkin/Lost Cat - On Halloween, Smurfette gives Wimpy a magic pumpkin to help him scare the other Smurfs. // When Azrael gets injured in the forest, Wild brings the cat to the Smurfs' village to heal

programme.desc: My Fair Cat Lady - Adelaide wants to help the city cats clean up their acts for adoption, but can she help these grumpy gatos?

programme.desc: Bummer Camp / Sleepstakes - When Gramps struggles to run Camp Mastadon, the kids come to his rescue. //The Loud kids help Lana get over her fear of sleepovers.

programme.desc: Time Trap! - When the kids break Mom and Dad's priceless vase, they decide the only thing to do is go back in time to their wedding day, and prevent them from ever receiving it.

programme.desc: Treats! / For Here or to Go - SpongeBob brings home a box of new snail treats that Gary will do anything to get – especially when they run out. // Plankton wins a free Krabby Patty, and Mr. Krabs will do anything to stop him from collecting.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S08 Ep175
programme.desc: It's a SpongeBob Christmas! - SpongeBob inadvertently helps Plankton enact his plot to put all of Bikini Bottom on Santa’s “naughty” list, and now has to stop Plankton before he gets his Christmas wish—the Krabby Patty secret formula!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S08 Ep176
programme.desc: Super Evil Aquatic Villian Team Up is Go! / Chum Fricassee - Plankton teams up with Man Ray to take over the Krusty Krab and then-the world! Hahahahahaha! // Squidward quits the Krusty Krab to work for Plankton, turning the Chum Bucket into an overnight success.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S03 Ep302
programme.desc: Squawk in the Name of Love / Date with Destiny - Sergio enlists Adelaide's help to become a gentleman in order to win Priscilla back! // Rosa hears an Ernesto Estrella prediction that Maria and Arturo could get back together - could it be true?

programme.desc: Skaters Gonna Hate / Born to Be Mild - Ronnie Anne and her pals enlist Carlos X as their coach in a skate-off against Tony Hawk! // Tired of the bullies at school, Alexis learns the tough guy ropes from Carl.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S03 Ep305

programme.title: Retrospektif: Seruan Suchi 1965 (New)
programme.desc: Filem ini mengisahkan tentang ibadah haji yang dilaksanakan pada tahun 1965. Seramai 5 ribu jemaah haji Malaysia berangkat menunaikan ibadah haji pada tahun ini antaranya termasuklah SPB YDP Agong Tuanku Syed Putra ibni Al-Marhum Syed Hassan Jamalulail dan Raja Permaisuri Agong. Upacara keberangkatan SPB YDPA diadakan di Lapangan Terbang Kuala Lumpur sambil diiringi oleh Perdana Menteri, Tunku Abdul Rahman. Ketibaan SPB YDPA disambut meriah oleh DYMM Al-Malik Faisal Al-Saud, Raja Arab Saudi diiringi ketua perwakilan asing dan penuntut-penuntut Malaysia di Arab Saudi. SPB YDPA merupakan Raja pertama yang membuat kunjungan rasmi ke Tanah Suci sejak dari Kerajaan Melayu Melaka 500 tahun yang lalu. SPB YDPA turut diberi penghormatan dengan melangsungkan istiadat membersih Kaabah diiringi Al-Malik Faisal. Turut di rakamkan adalah rukun-rukun dan wajib haji seperti wuquf di Arafah, bermalam di Muzdalifah, melontar, tawaf, sa’ie dan bercukur.

programme.title: Retrospektif: Menyahut Panggilan Tanah Suci 1975 (New)
programme.desc: Dokumentari yang merakamkan DYMM SPB YDA ke – 5 Sultan Abdul Halim Mu’adzam Shah bersama DYMM SPB Raja Permaisuri Agung yang menyahut panggilan ke Tanah Suci untuk menunaikan fardu Haji pada 17 Disember 1974 bersamaan 3 Zulhijjah 1394H. Sebelum berangkat, satu upacara ringkas telah diadakan di Lapangan Terbang Antarabangsa Kuala Lumpur sambil diiringi oleh Perdana Menteri, Timbalan Perdana Menteri, Menteri-Menteri Kabinet dan orang kenamaan. Setiba di Lapangan Terbang Antarabangsa Jeddah DYMM SPB YDA dan Raja Permaisuri Agung telah disambut oleh DYMM Al-Malik Faisal dan pegawai-pegawai, Duta Besar Malaysia ke Arab Saudi serta pegawai-pegawai kedutaan Malaysia. DYMM Al-Malik Faisal telah memperkenankan DYMM SPB YDA dan tetamu-tetamu Agung baginda dari negara Islam yang lain untuk turut serta dalam upacara membasuh Kaabah. Turut dirakamkan adalah perlakuan syarat dan rukun Haji yang wajib dilaksanakan bagi menyempurnakan Rukun Islam ke - 5 ini.

programme.title: Newsline In Depth
programme.desc: Introducing a colorful variety of feature stories, including reports on daily life from locations throughout Japan, as well as other parts of Asia and around the world.

programme.title: Kabuki Kool
programme.desc: Kabuki often depicts traditional Japanese dishes. Actor Kataoka Ainosuke introduces scenes with several examples, and teaches us about what foods were popular in the Edo period.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Direct Talk

programme.title: Dive In Tokyo
programme.desc: This time we visit Shimbashi, a business district in the heart of Tokyo. Learn about its history as the terminal of Japan's first railway and discover why it's considered an oasis for office workers.

programme.title: Newsline Asia 24
programme.desc: This daily news program picks up the key news stories of the past 24 hours from Japan and around Asia.

programme.title: Ramen Japan
programme.desc: In the birthplace of tonkotsu ramen, we visit a long-standing shop specializing in the Kurume style. Learn the surprising story of this cloudy pork-bone broth ramen from those who love it best.

programme.title: Magical Japanese
programme.desc: The Japanese language is rich in words and expressions influenced by nature, history, and culture. This episode looks at words related to bow and arrow. Explore the unique culture behind them.

programme.title: Core Kyoto Mini
programme.desc: Kyoto has many stores specializing in traditional snacks and treats, called Oyatsu. Some purveyors continue to use age-old ingredients and methods.

programme.title: Newsline Asia 24
programme.desc: This daily news program picks up the key news stories of the past 24 hours from Japan and around Asia.

programme.title: Frontrunners

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Vettori vs. Cannonier
programme.desc: Prelims - Top five contenders intent on keeping their hopes for a middleweight championship alive, Marvin Vettori and Jared Cannonier square off in the main event of UFC on ESPN on June 18 at the APEX in Las Vegas. Fresh from a win over rising star Roman Dolidze, Italy’s Vettori is determined to not let anyone pass him on the road to top, but he will have to survive the thunder thrown at him by Cannonier, who owns knockout victories over Anderson Silva, Jack Hermansson and Derek Brunson

programme.title: 2023 Gran Premio d'Italia Oakley Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights - The first time that Mugello hosted a Grand Prix event was in the year 1976, and the layout of the stunning Tuscan circuit, which undulates naturally within a beautiful tree lined valley, has remained practically the same ever since. The track was purchased by Ferrari in 1988 and renovated to their high standards shortly after - with excellent facilities and world class safety features. It became a permanent MotoGP™ venue from 1991 onwards. Italy’s love affair with bike racing is long and enduring. Manufacturers such as Mondial, Moto Guzzi, Gilera, MV Agusta, Morbidelli, Garelli, Cagiva and now Aprilia and Ducati all playing a role, in addition to great riders such as Giacomo Agostini and Valentino Rossi.

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Rampage Ep2315
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a one-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Emmett vs Topuria
programme.desc: Prelims - UFC Fight Night: Emmett vs Topuria is set to take place in June 2023, featuring a highly anticipated matchup between featherweight contenders Josh Emmett and Ilia Topuria. Both fighters bring an impressive record of wins and knockouts, promising an explosive battle in the octagon. The event will also showcase a stacked card of undercard and preliminary fights, featuring some of the best up-and-coming talent in the sport. UFC Fight Night: Emmett vs Topuria is a must-watch event for fans of mixed martial arts, promising an unforgettable night of high-octane action and fierce competition.
